rooms.description: Spacious entrance with minimalistic design and natural light from large windows.

Modern open-plan design blending the living area with the kitchen. Large windows on the facade ensure ample natural light and ventilation. Vastu recommendations suggest east or north facing openings for positive energy.
Spacious master bedroom with south-east orientation to harness natural light and proper Vastu alignment. Includes built-in wardrobes.
Cozy guest room with access to a private balcony for ventilation and light. Vastu alignment ensures energy balance.
Comfortable room designed with natural lighting in mind and a view for relaxation. Vastu-aligned east or north facing.
Compact dining area integrated with the living space. Vastu suggests placement in north-east sector to promote positive energy.
Functional corridor connecting the kitchen, bathrooms and utility areas. Vastu guidelines recommend avoiding direct line of sight between service areas and main living spaces.
Small guest bathroom designed for convenience. Vastu recommends north-west or west-facing openings for water-related spaces.
Private bathroom with modern fixtures and ample natural light from a skylight. Vastu suggests alignment to the north-east for optimal energy flow.
Space dedicated to storage and appliances. Vastu norms suggest placing utility areas in the south-west.

openings.description: Large window providing ample natural light and ventilation. Placed in the east or north facing as per Vastu recommendations.
Main entrance door ensuring secure entry and adhering to modern design aesthetics.
Access doors leading to private balconies for additional light and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Skylights to enhance natural lighting in enclosed spaces. Placement is designed considering Vastu and modern aesthetics.
